text:
[Verse]
Drops fall on my face
Sky is gray the mood is sweet
We laugh we chase we race
Barefoot down an empty street

[Verse 2]
Puddle jumps and we don't care
Clothes soaked hair's a mess
We wave our hands high in the air
Smile wide nothing to confess

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the rhythm feel no pain
Hearts beating just the same
Dancing dancing in the rain

[Verse 3]
Thunder rolls but we don't hear
Lost inside our own parade
Fear is far joy is near
Together in this dance we made

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the rhythm feel no pain
Hearts beating just the same
Dancing dancing in the rain

[Bridge]
Lightning lights the night
We are carefree souls
Under the stormy sky
Together making magic in the cold
title: Dancing in the Rain
